name: campus-tex-cli
description: A CLI to quickly generate latex files for presentations or task assignments, using the unofficial template by the University of Stuttgart.

scripts.test: npx tsc && npm run link-cli && npx campus-tex-cli
scripts.test-output-dir: npx tsc && npm run link-cli && npx campus-tex-cli -o ./test/output
scripts.test-template: npx tsc && npm run link-cli && npx campus-tex-cli -t ./test/template.json

author: quentinhoehne
